name: bj-cbvaldv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w2)

|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

comment: Version of ~ cbvald with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
